info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:59AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and southeastern Sherman Counties through 1230 AM MDT/130 AM CDT/... At 1157 PM MDT/1257 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a few strong thunderstorms near and just south of I-70, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Levant around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Colby. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 25 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall has occurred with this storm. Near zero visibility in heavy rainfall is possible.
